article: india 's top court suspended an arrest warrant friday against hollywood star richard gere , who is wanted for allegedly breaking public obscenity laws by kissing bollywood actress shilpa shetty at a public aids awareness event last year , an attorney said .
abstract: india s top court suspends arrest warrant against richard gere
